alert.note: Alert for Custer; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:02PM MDT until July 10 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 402 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northeastern Custer State Park, or 11 miles east of Custer, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... State Game Lodge around 410 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Fairburn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
